subject: fix: prevent false update banner on hard reload, improve PWA install UX
body:
Update button was showing after every hard reload even when there was
no actual update. Root cause: checking registration.waiting on initial
load which can be a stale worker from same version.

Fix: Only show update banner when updatefound event fires (genuinely
new SW detected after page load).

Also improved PWA install on Android Chrome:
- Added early global event listener to capture beforeinstallprompt
- Added promptWasReceived flag for better debugging
- Improved install instructions with context-aware messaging
